description:
A really simple plugin that limits an INPUT or TEXTAREA element to a specified
      number of characters and shows how many characters are remaining.
releaseNotes:
Fixed some JSHint messages and updated the README.md file to reflect the fact
      it has now been tested against jQuery 1.8.2.  Cleaned up the default styling for
      the inserted default <div>.  Got rid of the `fade: true` portion of the
      `fadeTarget` configuration object.  Now, if the `fadeTarget` is there, `fade`
      is assumed to be true. So now, if all you need is `fadeTarget {}` to have it
      fade fast.  `fadeTarget {speed: 'slow'}` makes it fade slow.  If you want
      the code to be more explicit, you can use `fadeTarget {speed: 'fast'}`.
summary:
I created this plugin as a learning exercise. There may already be one or more
      jQuery plugins that accomplish the same thing in a better manner. If so, feel
      free to use them. If not, then I hope someone will find this one useful. Since
      I wrote this plugin primarily as a learning exercise that would actually give
      me a useful product, I welcome any pointers or suggestions.
